bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: /usr/share/licenses/google-noto-fonts-common/{COPYING,LICENSE} are broken symlinks to ../LICENSE rather than the expected license files
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): Version : 20150929 Release : 1.fc24
google-noto-fonts-20150929-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-5fdbbe4b4c
google-noto-fonts-20150929-2.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-a613beeab9
Thanks Andrew for reporting this issue. COPYING and LICENSE both file were pointing to LICENSE file only. From onwards we will have only LICENSE file.

google-noto-fonts-20150929-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-5fdbbe4b4c

on my machine rpmlint catches this
$ rpmlint google-noto-fonts-common-20150929-1.fc24.noarch.rpm google-noto-fonts-common.noarch: W: dangling-relative-symlink /usr/share/licenses/google-noto-fonts-common/COPYING ../LICENSE google-noto-fonts-common.noarch: W: dangling-relative-symlink /usr/share/licenses/google-noto-fonts-common/LICENSE ../LICENSE

google-noto-fonts-20150929-2.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-a613beeab9
google-noto-fonts-20150929-2.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
google-noto-fonts-20150929-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
